text: Moses ga helekai gi Aaron mo ana dama daane dogolua ala ne dubu, go Eleazar mo Ithamar, “Goodou kaina tigidaumaha huwa laagau dela ne dubu i tigidaumaha meegai, dela ne hai ang gi Dimaadua. Kaina, heia nia palaawaa ala hagalee wanga ginai nia ‘yeast’, gaa gai nia maa i baahi di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha, idimaa tigidaumaha deenei le e dabuaahia.
